name: Super Dinos Escape
description:
A small squeaky dinosaur toy’s mission is to escape the rising lava.

---

Credits

Seniors:

Charlie Woodhead, Finn Drew, Leon Kershaw, Luca Tarantino, Emily Fortune, Tom Stevens, Filip Lichonczak  and Kylla Bufi

Juniors:

Kaite Kendrick, Jayesh Modhwadia, Anna Wood, Gabi Harper, Carlos Coutino,Raj Lakhani, Donovan Jones, Ryan Wong, Joshua Antwi, Jaz Hoyle, Ahmad Ghazi, Ryan Donnelly, Leah Spurrier, Cress Stevens 

---

Controls:

W,A,S,D - movement

SPACE - jump (x2 double jump)

CTRL - Ground pound (Whilst airborne)

E - Grab (Tongue grab while aiming)

F - Grapple

lmb - Attack  (Tongue attack while aiming)

rmb - Aiming

---
